content: *i really enjoy playing with yarns that stripe the lace adds just a bit of fun sparkle and playfulness so grab a pitcher of your favorite umbrella drink sit in the sun and enjoy some sox on the beach * pattern is fun knit in self-striping yarns but would be equally elegant knit in a semi-solid color too knit cuff down with an eye of partridge heel flap/gusset and wedge toe the lace travels down the instep large size may be obtained by knitting the medium size with a us 1 5 2 5mm sample knit with berroco sox #1454 originally offered as theknitter com april 2010 sotm club
